name: Maternity Leave
description: Leave for birth mothers to recover and care for a newborn.

name: Parental Leave
description: Leave for parents to care for a newborn or newly adopted child.

name: Compassionate Care Leave
description: Leave to care for a family member with a serious medical condition.

name: Personal Leave
description: Leave for personal matters, including family care and illness.

name: Medical Leave
description: Leave for employees unable to work due to personal illness or injury.

name: Leave Related to Critical Illness
description: Leave to care for a critically ill child or adult family member.

name: Bereavement Leave
description: Leave following the death of an immediate family member.

name: Leave Related to Death or Disappearance of a Child
description: Leave if a child disappears or dies due to a probable crime.

name: Leave for Victims of Family Violence
description: Leave for employees who are victims of family violence.

name: Reservist Leave
description: Leave for military reservists for deployment or training.
